JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description      Experience in .net 3.5 and 4.0, SQL Server 2005 and 2008    Strong background in database development    Experience in MVC Architecture is a must    Experience writing stored procedures for SQL Server using Transact SQL    Experience in business logic development in C#/VB.NET and front end using Web Forms (ASP.NET)    Knowledge of JQuery, JSON and socket programming    Understanding of LINQ, WCF, Web Services and AJAX    Knowledge of XAML and Silverlight is preferential    Should be able to design and develop web applications    Interpret written business requirements and technical specification documents    Able to handle standalone projects    Perform maintenance programming and correction of identified defects    Must have developed at least one product      Skills Required:      Excellent communication as well as documentation skills    A good team player    Strong analytical and reporting skills    Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment
